comment: Why do you expose the tasks state? I think this could be a private field
Consider allowing the user to also type the first letter of a category (p) instead of always the full name (priority).
Is there any restriction on this? Can it be negative?
Same as `reverseTaskStatus`, this does not check if index is a valid index of the arraylist, since it might be a negative number which would cause an app crash
